vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
μώλωψ, ωπος, ὁ,
mark of a stripe, weal, bruise, [LXX+4th c.BC+]; of an eruption resembling mosquito bites, [Refs 1st c.AD+]; blood-clot, [Refs 7th c.AD+]; πορφύρεοι μώλωπες, satirically of kings, Daphit. cited in [Refs 1st c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: the mark of a blow; a stripe, a wound, welt, bruise 1Pet. 2:24*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 淤青, 傷痕, 鞭痕, 傷口 (彼前 2:24)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 淤青, 伤痕, 鞭痕, 伤口 (彼前 2:24)
